rationales.conformity: She suppresses disagreement and smiles while others impose parenting decisions to avoid household conflict.
rationales.self_direction: Her preferred routine and authority as Sami's mother are overridden without her asserting her choice.

rationales.benevolence: She stays vigilant through her son's fever and emphasizes knowing his care needs in detail.
rationales.self_direction: She experiences help as disempowering because caregiving decisions happen without her consent.
She carves out private space to continue design work despite crowded household constraints.
rationales.achievement: She completes a substantive logo draft and advances client work under difficult conditions.

rationales.benevolence: Her exhaustion is directly tied to sustained nighttime caregiving during Sami's teething period.

rationales.tradition: She participates fully in Eid household preparations and family obligations.
rationales.self_direction: She chooses and commits to wearing the dress she likes despite criticism.
rationales.conformity: She resists pressure to present herself according to her mother-in-law's expected image of a young mother.

rationales.self_direction: Wearing the dress and feeling steady reflects an intentional reclaiming of personal identity.
She keeps a private financial buffer to preserve personal agency inside a shared household.
rationales.achievement: She earns and saves income from freelance design work as proof of independent capability.
rationales.tradition: She explicitly rejects the inherited model where husbands control wives' money.
She joins in family cooking and receives intergenerational instruction in customary food preparation.
rationales.benevolence: She remains patient and relationally engaged with both Sami and her mother-in-law throughout the day.

rationales.tradition: She participates in extended-family village customs and gendered social rituals during the visit.
rationales.self_direction: She quietly uses the setting to sketch design ideas for her own creative work.
She persists in building a parallel identity as a paid designer despite household role pressure.
rationales.achievement: She accepts a higher-value client project and commits to delivering it under tight constraints.

rationales.self_direction: She discloses her freelance work but still insists on handling that domain in her own way.
rationales.conformity: She declines the expected path of letting her husband mediate with his mother on her behalf.
She presents a united 'everything is fine' response at dinner to prevent further household tension.
